Package com.intellij.execution.configuration

Class RunConfigurationExtensionBase<T extends RunConfigurationBase<?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.execution.configuration.RunConfigurationExtensionBase<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DeployToServerRunConfigurationExtension, PythonRunConfigurationExtension, RunConfigurationExtension

    public abstract class RunConfigurationExtensionBase<T extends RunConfigurationBase<?>>
extends java.lang.Object
    Allows a plugin to extend a run configuration created by another plugin.

      • RunConfigurationExtensionBase

        public RunConfigurationExtensionBase()

    • Method Detail

      • getSerializationId

        protected java.lang.String getSerializationId()
        Returns the ID used to serialize the settings.
        Returns:
        the serialization ID (must be unique across all run configuration extensions).

      • readExternal

        protected void readExternal(T runConfiguration,
                            Element element)
        Loads the settings of this extension from the run configuration XML element. In memory, the settings can be placed into the user data of the run configuration.
        Parameters:
        runConfiguration - the run configuration being deserialized.
        element - the element with persisted settings.

      • writeExternal

        protected void writeExternal(T runConfiguration,
                             Element element)
        Saves the settings of this extension to the run configuration XML element.
        Parameters:
        runConfiguration - the run configuration being serialized.
        element - the element into which the settings should be persisted,

      • createEditor

        protected <P extends T> SettingsEditor<P> createEditor(P configuration)
        Creates an editor for the settings of this extension. The editor is displayed as an additional tab of the run configuration options in the Run/Debug Configurations dialog.
        Parameters:
        configuration - the configuration being edited.
        Returns:
        the editor component, or null if this extension doesn't provide any UI for editing the settings.

      • getEditorTitle

        protected java.lang.String getEditorTitle()
        Returns the title of the tab in which the settings editor is displayed.
        Returns:
        the editor tab title, or null if this extension doesn't provide any UI for editing the settings.

      • isApplicableFor

        public abstract boolean isApplicableFor(T configuration)
        Parameters:
        configuration - Run configuration
        Returns:
        True if extension in general applicable to given run configuration - just to attach settings tab, etc. But extension may be turned off in its settings. E.g. RCov in general available for given run configuration, but may be turned off.

      • isEnabledFor

        public abstract boolean isEnabledFor(T applicableConfiguration,
                                     RunnerSettings runnerSettings)
        Parameters:
        applicableConfiguration - Applicable run configuration
        Returns:
        True if extension is turned on in configuration extension settings. E.g. RCov is turned on for given run configuration.

      • patchCommandLine

        protected abstract void patchCommandLine(T configuration,
                                         RunnerSettings runnerSettings,
                                         GeneralCommandLine cmdLine,
                                         java.lang.String runnerId)
                                  throws ExecutionException
        Patches the command line of the process about to be started by the underlying run configuration.
        Parameters:
        configuration - the underlying run configuration.
        runnerSettings - the runner-specific settings.
        cmdLine - the command line of the process about to be started.
        runnerId - the ID of the ProgramRunner used to start the process.
        Throws:
        ExecutionException - if there was an error configuring the command line and the execution should be canceled.

      • patchCommandLine

        protected void patchCommandLine(T configuration,
                                RunnerSettings runnerSettings,
                                GeneralCommandLine cmdLine,
                                java.lang.String runnerId,
                                Executor executor)
                         throws ExecutionException
        Patches the command line of the process about to be started by the underlying run configuration.
        Parameters:
        configuration - the underlying run configuration.
        runnerSettings - the runner-specific settings.
        cmdLine - the command line of the process about to be started.
        runnerId - the ID of the ProgramRunner used to start the process.
        executor - the executor which is using to run the configuration
        Throws:
        ExecutionException - if there was an error configuring the command line and the execution should be canceled.

      • attachToProcess

        protected void attachToProcess(T configuration,
                               ProcessHandler handler,
                               RunnerSettings runnerSettings)
        Attaches the extension to a process that has been started.
        Parameters:
        configuration - the underlying run configuration.
        handler - the ProcessHandler for the running process.
        runnerSettings - the runner-specific settings.

      • validateConfiguration

        protected void validateConfiguration(T configuration,
                                     boolean isExecution)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Validate extensions after general configuration validation passed
        Parameters:
        isExecution - true if the configuration is about to be executed, false if the configuration settings are being edited.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • extendCreatedConfiguration

        protected void extendCreatedConfiguration(T configuration,
                                          Location location)
        Setup extension settings for a run configuration that has been created from context.
        Parameters:
        configuration - Configuration created from context.
        location - the location from which the configuration was created.

        protected void extendTemplateConfiguration(T configuration)
